author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

An unlabeled module can occur if a Task/Sequence/Path holds an object which is never directly seen by the cms.Process.

#### PR validation:

A case where an unlabelled module occurred was tested with the change and it reports where the object was declared.

resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1849
title: Give file and line number if configuration has an unlabeled module
